attributes.action: Repeal the right of the police  to store information on innocent people accused and cleared of crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are falsely accused of an arrestable offence such as harrassment, the  police can forcebly take your finger prints,your DNA,  photograph you  and store your infomation even you  if you are later found  innocent. They can  use this information regardless of whether you gave your consent. Innocent people are being treated like criminals.

This is a back door route to identity cards

INNOCENT UNTIL PROVEN GUILTY

NO GUILT NO DNA
